sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, non-persistent calculator MVP. Establish complete auth infrastructure. Build the initial CI/CD setup for docs and a11y checks.
epic_coverage: Core Calculator Functionality, User Identity & Authentication, Specialized Electronics Modes, Cross-Cutting Concerns
key_deliverables: Functional core calculator with history; Ohm's law mode; User registration/login system; Foundational IaC (Cognito); CI/CD jobs for docs and a11y.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate basic arithmetic; Show Ohm's law calculation; Successfully register a new user and log in.
success_criteria: All Sprint 1 tasks completed; User registration flow is functional and secure; Core calculator is usable.
risk_factors: Complexity of OAuth PKCE flow; Misconfiguration of Cognito IaC.
mitigation_strategies: Use a well-vetted library for OAuth; Pair programming on IaC; Thorough E2E testing of auth flow.
integration_windows: Integration of frontend auth with backend/Cognito in week 2.
burndown_target: Linear burndown targeting completion by day 10.

sprint_goal: Enable data persistence for history. Build the complete custom mode wizard UI framework and backend API. Integrate the help system modal.
epic_coverage: User Data Persistence, User-Extensible Custom Modes, Cross-Cutting Concerns
key_deliverables: Persistent history for logged-in users; Backend API for custom modes; Multi-step wizard framework for creating modes; Functional in-app help modal.
demo_objectives: Log in and show that previous history loads; Create a new custom mode using the wizard (up to formula step); Open the in-app help system.
success_criteria: History is persisted across sessions; A user can fully define a custom mode in the wizard UI; Help system is accessible.
risk_factors: RISK-001: Complexity of custom mode wizard UI; Styling conflicts in help system integration.
mitigation_strategies: Pair programming on the wizard component; Use iframe or CSS scoping for help content.
integration_windows: Frontend history with backend API in week 1; Wizard with backend API in week 2.
burndown_target: Linear burndown targeting completion by day 10.

sprint_goal: Deliver the secure sandbox for custom mode execution and the core framework for offline data synchronization.
epic_coverage: User-Extensible Custom Modes, User Data Persistence & Synchronization
key_deliverables: Secure AWS Lambda for formula execution; Backend API to orchestrate execution; Service worker for offline capability; IndexedDB queuing service; Conflict resolution logic.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate API endpoint for custom mode execution with a valid formula; Show application loading and functioning while offline; Show a pending change in IndexedDB after an offline action.
success_criteria: Sandbox Lambda passes security review; Offline framework is in place and testable.
risk_factors: RISK-004: Security of `isolated-vm` sandbox; RISK-003: Complexity of offline sync state management.
mitigation_strategies: Run Lambda in a restricted AWS account; Extensive E2E testing for offline scenarios in next sprint.
integration_windows: Backend API with Lambda sandbox in week 2; Frontend offline queue with network listener.
burndown_target: Linear burndown targeting completion by day 10.

sprint_goal: Complete the custom mode user flow, conduct final QA for offline and custom modes, and perform the major accessibility remediation across the entire app.
epic_coverage: User-Extensible Custom Modes, User Data Persistence & Synchronization, Cross-Cutting Concerns
key_deliverables: Fully functional custom mode execution from UI; Comprehensive test suites for offline and custom modes; Application compliant with WCAG 2.1 AA.
demo_objectives: End-to-end flow: create a custom mode, launch it, enter values, and get a correct result; Demonstrate data syncing after an offline session; Showcase keyboard-only navigation and screen reader compatibility.
success_criteria: All acceptance criteria for custom modes and offline sync are met; Application passes WCAG 2.1 AA audit.
risk_factors: RISK-002: Underestimation of accessibility remediation effort; RISK-003: Discovery of critical data loss bugs in offline sync.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize accessibility fixes by impact; Allocate buffer time for fixing any discovered sync bugs.
integration_windows: Final QA and validation of all integrated features.
burndown_target: Complete all tasks by end of sprint.
